ComicInfo.Summary:
WHEN THERE ARE ONLY VILLAINS, BEING A HERO MAKES YOU A...SUICIDE RISK. Barely able to grasp the unexpected turn his life has taken, simple beat cop Leo Winters launches his own, offthebooks investigation into the supervillains that decimated his unit and put his partner in the hospital. With little to go on but the image of Memento Mori turning people into dust with all but a touch, Leo must delve into a her past to discover the key to his future...
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/suicide-risk-3-grudge-war-part-two/4000-415282/
